channel.description: Recent content in Remote.com on I aM YUVII

item.title: Freelancing or Job?
item.description: Enthusiasm for freelancing is mounting day by day. Due to good income and flexible timing , Indian youth are now charmed towards it. So i am posting this blog only for them. Benefits of Job Static working hours In full time jobs working hours are defined , You have to work 8-9 hours daily. You have to go office at fixed time . Fixed holidays Some companies offers 5 holidays in a month including Sundays.
